amendatorysection.catchline: Subpoena to party; failure to attend and testify; continuance; costs.
amendatorysection.para: In addition to the above remedies, if a party to a suit in his own right on being duly subpoenaed, failed to appear and give testimony, the other party may, at his option, have a continuance of the cause as in cases of other witnesses, and at the cost of the delinquent.
